mapper.select: select form_page_id as fid,concat(description,'[',page_name,']') page_name,description,'0' as parent_id,'page' as type_name,page_name as call_method_code from form_page where deleted=0 UNION ALL select form_apiconfig_id,method_name as page_name,remarks as description, page_id as parent_id,'api' as type_name,call_method_code from form_apiconfig
